title: Respond to Security Questionnaire
description: A large enterprise lead requires the company to complete a detailed security questionnaire as part of their procurement process.

tasks.description: Receive the security questionnaire from the prospective customer.
Use an internal knowledge base of pre-approved answers to fill out as much of the questionnaire as possible.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the tool to answer a majority of the standard questions.

tasks.description: For any new or unanswered questions, escalate them to the internal security team for a formal response.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly routes the remaining questions to the security team.
